data.actual_result: The bottom of the codeblock and the top of the emoji is actually touching.
data.short_description: Bottom of the codeblock is touching the space of the line below.
data.steps_to_repro: - Type in a codeblock on line 1, and a clip emoji (or some emoji that's tall) on line 2 in the same message. - Observe the bottom of the codeblock and the top of the emoji.
